title: Orphaned Radioactive Sources
description: There are an estimated two million radioactive sources in the US, with about 500,000 no longer needed or wanted by their owners, posing a potential threat if they fall into the wrong hands. These 'orphaned' sources can cause economic damage and potentially be used by terrorists.
